title: Mental Health Across the Life Course
description: This course examines mental health from infancy through childhood into adulthood and aging. Students will learn how perturbations in mental health manifest differently at different developmental stages over the life course. The course will also cover how early life exposures to stressful circumstances can lead to symptoms, disorder, or disease and how these manifest themselves across development. Students will explore potential strategies for identification of risk, prevention, and intervention.
